title: Bobby's Sandwich Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small cafe and sandwich bar providing take-away food as various sandwiches and toasts and bagels. About one sandwich out of four is vegan and is clearly labeled as such. In addition to that there is a daily special vegan soup being offered. Soy milk for coffee is available. Free wi-fi. Outdoor seating is limited.
